experience.title: Head Of Business Development and R&D
experience.description: Handling business development of Blockchain and Crypto division for the organisation for both product as well as service ends. Prime responsibilities include managing the business team, working on keeping them motivated, communicating with clients, keeping clients updated on ongoing development,generating ongoing monthly & quarterly business for company ultimately by analyzing scope of proposed solution, interpreting business needs, translating tech issues, spell out the project details and and requirements,political guides, legal advises & validation and representing project stakeholder throughout the SDLC.
experience.description_html: Handling business development of Blockchain and Crypto division for the organisation for both product as well as service ends. Prime responsibilities include managing the business team, working on keeping them motivated, communicating with clients, keeping clients updated on ongoing development,generating ongoing monthly & quarterly business for company ultimately by analyzing scope of proposed solution, interpreting business needs, translating tech issues, spell out the project details and and requirements,political guides, legal advises & validation and representing project stakeholder throughout the SDLC.

experience.title: Managing Director
experience.description: Directing strategy towards the profitable growth and operation of the company. • Developing strategic operating plans that reflect the longer-term objectives and priorities established by the board. • Maintaining an ongoing dialogue with the Chair of the board. • Putting in place adequate operational planning and financial control systems. • Closely monitoring the operating and financial results against plans and budgets. • Taking remedial action where necessary and informing the board of significant changes. • Maintaining the operational performance of the company. • Building and maintaining an effective executive team.
experience.description_html: Directing strategy towards the profitable growth and operation of the company. • Developing strategic operating plans that reflect the longer-term objectives and priorities established by the board. • Maintaining an ongoing dialogue with the Chair of the board. • Putting in place adequate operational planning and financial control systems. • Closely monitoring the operating and financial results against plans and budgets. • Taking remedial action where necessary and informing the board of significant changes. • Maintaining the operational performance of the company. • Building and maintaining an effective executive team.

experience.title: Co-Founder & MD
experience.description: Working On Education System:-My Vision:-To empower students to make lifelong, responsible and meaningful choices in a global and dynamic world.A future in which students discover and develop meaningful career paths that enhance their lives and communities.My Beliefs:•  All children are unique and should be treated with respect and dignity.•  Every student can succeed.•  Learning is a lifelong process.•  Fostering a positive self-image is the collaborative effort of the school, home, and community which     leads to responsible and productive citizenship.•  The diverse needs of all students must be addressed through the school counseling program.•  Every student needs appropriate personal and social skills to achieve optimum benefits from the     educational program.•  A comprehensive, developmental school counseling program is not a support service but an integral     part of the total education program.•  A developmentally appropriate school counseling program provides important benefits to individual     students by addressing their intellectual, emotional, social, physical, and psychological needs.
experience.description_html: Working On Education System:-My Vision:-To empower students to make lifelong, responsible and meaningful choices in a global and dynamic world.A future in which students discover and develop meaningful career paths that enhance their lives and communities.My Beliefs:• All children are unique and should be treated with respect and dignity.• Every student can succeed.• Learning is a lifelong process.• Fostering a positive self-image is the collaborative effort of the school, home, and community which  leads to responsible and productive citizenship.• The diverse needs of all students must be addressed through the school counseling program.• Every student needs appropriate personal and social skills to achieve optimum benefits from the  educational program.• A comprehensive, developmental school counseling program is not a support service but an integral  part of the total education program.• A developmentally appropriate school counseling program provides important benefits to individual  students by addressing their intellectual, emotional, social, physical, and psychological needs.

experience.title: Director
experience.description: Responsible for the day-to day running of the business with a particular emphasis on sales and business development. Making sure that the business continues to grow by way of developing new clients while maintaining its existing customer base.•	Initiatives and Dutieso	Worked as an ambassador of the business at all times.o	Monitoring business activity, studying the outcome of projects.o	Generating new business through online prospecting, cold calling, face to face meetings and networkingo	Reviewing existing contracts and looking for growth opportunities.o	Implementing sales and marketing strategies and planso	Writing up sales reports, activity reports and revenue forecasts.o	Plan approaches and pitches. * Work with team to develop proposals that speaks to the client’s needs, concerns, and objectives.o	Completing all documentation and administrative records, fully and accurately•	AchievementsPlayed key role in company initiatives for developing new projects for future use.o	Successfully implemented and restructured the Idea o	Founder of whizzpick (a sales/customer oriented idea of Banja Hero)o	Increased profits by 30% in a highly competitive environment by focusing on the less price sensitive customer segments who valued service, which eliminated the need to use price as a mechanism for securing new business.o	Reduced the time required to respond to customer requests and improved customer satisfaction by providing front line counter staff with the skills, knowledge authority needed to resolve customer enquiries and complaints.
experience.description_html: Responsible for the day-to day running of the business with a particular emphasis on sales and business development. Making sure that the business continues to grow by way of developing new clients while maintaining its existing customer base.• Initiatives and Dutieso Worked as an ambassador of the business at all times.o Monitoring business activity, studying the outcome of projects.o Generating new business through online prospecting, cold calling, face to face meetings and networkingo Reviewing existing contracts and looking for growth opportunities.o Implementing sales and marketing strategies and planso Writing up sales reports, activity reports and revenue forecasts.o Plan approaches and pitches. * Work with team to develop proposals that speaks to the client’s needs, concerns, and objectives.o Completing all documentation and administrative records, fully and accurately• AchievementsPlayed key role in company initiatives for developing new projects for future use.o Successfully implemented and restructured the Idea o Founder of whizzpick (a sales/customer oriented idea of Banja Hero)o Increased profits by 30% in a highly competitive environment by focusing on the less price sensitive customer segments who valued service, which eliminated the need to use price as a mechanism for securing new business.o Reduced the time required to respond to customer requests and improved customer satisfaction by providing front line counter staff with the skills, knowledge authority needed to resolve customer enquiries and complaints.

experience.title: Department Head
experience.description: Led a 2 tier team of Institute’s Biggest Social Group of 500 volunteers with 8 other headsInitiatives Administered Paper Collection Drive across the campus for reusing by makingnotebooks Conceptualized Biodiversity mapping Project creating awareness of 20endangered species out of 750 species found in campusAchievements Organized the welfare campaign for the Jammu and Kashmir flood victims andraised a sum of INR 2.15 lakh and collected old clothes weighing 2500kgs andGot media coverage for conducted activities in The Hindustan Times . Oversaw various welfare programs such as Swachh Bharat Abhiyan,UnnatBharat Abhiyan Awarded with Certificate of Appreciation by Dean of Student Affairs foraltruistic efforts Get Certificate of Appreciation from “The Imagindia Institute” for Come , CleanIndia Drive

experience.title: Convener

experience.title: Overall Manager “Ek Shaam Sarv Sikha Ke Naam”
experience.description:  Solely responsible for the seven days event organized by “Sarv Siksha Abhiyan”, led team of 500 member Visited Three tehsils, around 50 villages in 7 days and addressed 3000+ people By “Awareness Drive” aware the people about education, their basic right, child marriage etc. Basis of Survey Report prepared by team SSA introduced many camp and projects especially for girls and 500+ children’s joined camp from these 3 tehsils.

projects: [{"title":"A Burglar Alarm Project","start_date":"Jul 2013","end_date":"Nov 2015","description":"Guide: prof Udayan Ganguly, Dept. of Electrical Engineering, IIT Bombay A burglar alarm which beeps when somebody cross a protected area. Incorporating a circuit element which varies its output across its terminal with variation of intensity of light Using the circuit in two different states(On/Off), LDR(Light dependent resistor), Op Amp, PNP And Resistors"},{"title":"Thermoelectricity: Materials and Applications | Seminar Project","start_date":"Jan 2015","end_date":"Apr 2015","description":"Guide: Prof. Titas Dasgupta, Dept. of Metallurgical Engineering & Material Science, IIT Bombay Extensive study of the fundamentals of thermoelectricity and its history. Documented a report and briefed a presentation for the project on a brief review on bismuth telluride, a thermoelectric material"},{"title":"Firewood Cook Stove | CTARA, IIT Bombay","start_date":"Jul 2014","end_date":"Nov 2014","description":"Guide: Prof. Shireesh Kedare, Dept. of Energy Science & Engineering, IIT Bombay Undertook 200 hrs. Study tours near Thane to analyses cook stove, environmental & social aspects of recycling. Surveyed over 4 pada(small villages) and 200 families to understand structure of cook stove and related problems. And come up with a new Cook Stove with good efficiency"},{"title":"Computer Programming and Utilization Project","start_date":"Jul 2012","end_date":"Nov 2012","description":"Guide: Prof Abhiram Ranade, Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Bombay• It is programmed a Snake Game from C++ Programming"}]
